name: Balls vs Blocks!
description:
Balls vs Blocks is a funny and challenging game based on the classic brick games. Swipe your finger to move the platform left or right and keep the balls bouncing to break the blocks. The level of the blocks will be decreased after each bounce. Try to break many blocks as possible before they move down.

Game Features:
* Endless game-play.
* Over 25 balls and power-ups to play.
* Simple ball control using a platform.
* Score competition with players all around the world.
* Share your in-game image with your friends on the social networks.
